Correct Output: define intent buildIntent: for endpoint('network') add middlebox('traffic monitor')

Intents: No individual service or system running on the wired/wireless network should use more than 10 gigabytes of per day, regardless of whether it is inbound or outbound over the commodity network link

Correct Output: define intent buildIntent: for endpoint('network') set quota('any', '10', 'gb/d')

Intents: The system will trigger an overuse notification if the average for either inbound or outbound usage exceeds 10 GB per week

Correct Output: define intent buildIntent: for endpoint('network') add middlebox('overuse notification') set quota('any', '10', 'gb/wk')
